definitions: Sets up (an organization, system, or set of rules) on a firm or permanent basis.
Achieves permanent acceptance or recognition for.
Shows (something) to be true or valid.
Introduces (a person or oneself) into a new place or society and secures acceptance.
examples: The company establishes new branches every year.
Research establishes a link between diet and health.
She establishes herself as a leader in the community.
